metadata.title: Research
metadata.description: Our research focuses on advancing artificial intelligence through innovative approaches in machine learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.

data.title: Optical Micromanipulation
data.description: Core principle: Uses focused laser beams to trap, move, or rotate microscopic particles via optical forces (radiation pressure and gradient force).
project: Key technologies: Optical tweezers, Smart Memory Alloy
Application 1: Cell and organelle manipulation in biology
Application 2: Contactless handling in microfluidics and soft matter
Research focus 2: ML-based perception for closed loop control
Research focus 3: AI-enhanced human-robot shared control

data.title: Magnetic Micromanipulation
data.description: Core principle: Uses external magnetic fields to steer and actuate micro-objects made of or containing magnetic materials.
project: Key technologies: Electromagnetic coils, permanent magnet arrays, rotating field
Application 1: Targeted drug delivery and microrobots
Research focus 1: Closed-loop magnetic control systems
Research focus 2: Multiscale swarming and collective micromanipulation

data.title: Piezo-actuated Micromanipulation
data.description: Core principle: Uses piezoelectric materials that deform under applied voltage to drive high-precision, low-drift motion at micro- and nanoscales.
project: Key technologies: Piezo stages, nanopositioners, zero-drift actuators
Research focus 1: Human-Robot Shared Control for micromanipulation
